:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Linksys Smart Wi-Fi Router AC 1600 Video Enthusiast}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA6400|pid=01t80000003K7eCAAS}} "48SAB403.SGD[G]" and the '''Cisco''' logo is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This device appears to be using BCM4708A0 (BCM4708A0KFEBG) :The Flash is presumed to be a ''Spansion'' S34ML01G100TFI00 {{WiFiCert|WFA18396|02/06/2013}} ===News=== *[https://www.linksys.com/us/pressreleases/pr_page_1224695566355/ Announced in this press release made 01/07/2013 on '''Cisco'''] :[http://www.engadget.com/2013/01/07/linksys-reveals-a-trio-of-802-11ac-wifi-routers-with-beamforming/ Via '''Engadget'''] *[http://ces.cnet.com/8301-34439_1-57562440/cisco-adds-three-more-routers-to-its-802.11ac-portfolio/ ''Cisco adds three more routers to its 802.11ac portfolio'' - On '''CNET'''] :One USB 3.0 port
